      Our client list is constantly growing. Here is just a sampling of some of our work. They vary from small business owners to major organizations.
Our Web Development Team will customize a site for you that meets
your needs and fits your budget.
Feel free to visit our satisfied customers.

Westchester County Association
One of our original clients, they needed a large site with complex navigation. Bringing business, travel. recreation, education, employment and many other categories together under one site.

Yorktown Stage
An easy to use site that lets you 
purchase tickets online.

John C. Hart Memorial Library
This elegant easy to navigate site was built with the direction of the Library's Director. A helpful link to Westchester's Library System enables users to log on the main data base.

Dayton, Corey & Dubben, Inc
Insurance Agency

Curry Auto Group
This large site combines a data base search with easy navigation to offer a full range of options in searching for the  new or pre-owned car you want.

Yorktown Chamber of Commerce
Includes a member directory data base and a monthly newsletter updated by the Chamber, easily trained by the Yep staff.

Dr. Copeland  
This e-commerce site for a plastic surgeon and skin-care specialist, presents surgical procedures
in an easy friendly format.
Order skin care programs online.

Verde USA
Introducing a new, imported gourmet olive oil to the mature US market is a marketing and merchandising challenge. Olio Verde met this challenge with a creative and informative site which includes wonderful seasonal recipes, updated regularly by the YEP staff.

Dills' Best Building Centers
Well known locally for their friendly, helpful approach to customer service, Dill's brings the same personality to their lighthearted web site, packed with information about the fine materials and supplies available at Dills' Best.

C.S. McClellan Real Estate
This site was completely redesigned and customized to allow the staff at C.S. McClellan to update their listings and newsletter.

The Mix Band
A fun site with information about this
 exciting new band, their music and the schedule of their upcoming club dates.
Redhotprice.com
Frames facilitate quick access to appliance and electronic manufacturers for product information without leaving the main site. A form makes it easy for RedHotPrice to send and receive customer information in a customized format. They were delighted to receive new business from this site the first week it was up!
